profiles.name: Priyanka
profiles.statement: I love to Cook Food for my family.

recipes.title: Crispy Chestnuts
recipes.ingredients: •Tinned chestnuts 1 cup •Oil 1 tablespo to deep fry •Cornflour 2 teaspoons •Refined flour (maida) 2 teaspoons •Salt to taste •Soy sauce 1 teaspoon •Sweet red chilli sauce 4 tablespoons •Red chilli powder 1 1/2 teaspoons •Ginger finely chopped 2 teaspoons •Garlic finely chopped 2 teaspoons •Spring onions with greens 4
recipes.direction: Step 1 Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Step 2 Take chestnuts in a bowl. Add cornflour , refined flour, salt, soy sauce, 1 tablespoon red chilli sauce and ½ teaspoon red chilli powder and mix well. Step 3 Deep-fry chestnuts in hot oil till golden and crisp. Step 4 Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick wok. Step 5 Cut spring onion bulbs into roundels. Reserve the greens. Step 6 Add the spring onion bulb roundels, ginger and garlic to the wok and saute till golden. Step 7 Add remaining red chilli sauce and remaining red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Step 8 Cut reserved spring onion greens into roundels. Step 9 Drain the chestnuts and add to the wok, mix and cook for a minute. Step 10 Serve hot garnished with spring onion green roundels

recipes.title: chesse Gravy
recipes.ingredients: • Paneer - 250 grams. • Curry powder - 1 tablespoon. • Butter - 2 tablespoons. • Tomatoes - 3 numbers. • Red bell pepper - 1 number. • Red chilly - 2 numbers. • Ginger - 1 piece. • Onion (medium size) - 1 number. • Oil - 1 tablespoon. • Cream - 2 tablespoons. • Kasoori methi - ½ tea spoon. • Salt - to taste. • Garlic - 4 cloves.
recipes.direction: Heat oil in a pan add chopped onions, chopped ginger, and garlic, red chilly, add red bell pepper, tomatoes, kasoori methi, salt, put the lid on and cook this on a slow flame till tomatoes and bell peppers are tender. Let it cool down put this into a blender make a paste. Heat butter in a pan add curry powder, cook this for 4 minutes, add tomato, bell pepper, paste, mix it. Once come to boil add paneer, cream, mix this and cook it for 5 minutes and switch off the flame.
